profilePara1: I'm a software developer based in Vancouver. My passion is not only implementing frontend features but also expanding my knowledge in backend development through combining apps with RESTful APIs and databases.
profilePara2: Ever since I started designing systems in my career and teaching myself programming, I've been obsessed with the feeling when I see the app working as planned after dealing with problems step by step. I love the idea that there's more yet to learn and update in the software development industry, which I believe leads to my self-growth consistently.
